document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2014-04
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA, APPROVING A ZONING ORDINANCE AMENDMENT TO ADD A RESIDENTIAL OVERLAY ZONING DISTRICT TO A 10-ACRE PORTION OF A 17-ACRE PARCEL LOCATED AT THE NORTHEAST CORNER OF HIGHWAY 29 AND NAPA JUNCTION ROAD, APN 059-020-001 (FILE NO. PL 13-0033)
